item.title: Deploying Apache Pulsar on Kubesphere
item.description: KubeSphere, an open-source container platform running on Kubernetes, provides users with an app-centric experience. Apache Pulsar, a cloud-native, distributed messaging and streaming platform In this article, I will demonstrate how to install Apache Pulsar on a KubeSphere cluster. Before you begin To install Pulsar on KubeSphere, you need to do the following beforehand: Create a Kubernetes cluster with KubeSphere installed. You can deploy both Kubernetes and KubeSphere using KubeKey on public cloud instances or in an air-gapped environment.
